price: 14. Then We made you successors after them, generations after generations in the land, that We might see how you would work.
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ خَلَٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ لِنَنظُرَ كَيۡفَ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnākum khalāifa fī al-arḍi min baʿdihim linanẓura kayfa taʿmalūna
